resources.string: Do not have an account? Register
I agree to the terms and conditions and the privacy policy

Today, students who are new to university sometimes have difficulty in finding the same editions of the books that their lecturers want to be used. \n\nWe created this application to solve this problem.With this application, you can find and buy university books that you cannot find.

Your IP address and user agent information are only used for analytics and cookies etc. will be processed by means of technologies, automatic or non-automatic methods and sometimes obtained from third parties such as analytical providers, ad networks, search information providers, technology providers, recorded, stored and updated, within the framework and duration of the service and contractual relationship between us, on the basis of the legitimate interest processing condition. Your personal data that you share with us only by analyzing; to fulfill the requirements of the services we offer in the best way, to ensure that these services can be accessed by you and benefited from them at the maximum level, to develop our services in line with your needs and to bring you together with wider service providers within legal frameworks, It will be processed and updated in accordance with its purpose and in a measured manner during the contract and service period.Your personal data that you share with us; It can be transferred to third parties, institutions and organizations at home and abroad, with which we receive and/or provide services to carry out our activities, with whom we have contractual relations, with whom we cooperate, and to judicial and administrative authorities upon request, provided that necessary technical and administrative measures are taken.
If you want to get more detailed information,you can check out our Help Page or you can send us an e-mail.
It will reach you as soon as possible
